txt.en: The half-orcs at Târ Stazg were dismayed by the defeat of Akashpug, but were not driven off.

'Though they are unmanned, Târ Stazg still presents a threat to Eregion. If we do not act quickly, they will rebuild their force and bring it to bear at Barad Morlas still.

'We must drive the half-orcs from Eregion... with fire if it must be so. Return to Târ Stazg and set ablaze the tents of the half-orcs. Without shelter and supplies, they will become easy prey for our scouts.

'The tents are spread throughout Târ Stazg, north-east of Echad Dúnann, along the mountains before the Redhorn Gate.'

The half-orc tents are at Târ Stazg, north-east of Echad Dúnann, along the mountains before the Redhorn Gate.\n\nIn order to drive the disorganized half-orcs from Eregion, Palanaer has tasked you with destroying their tents.
'Stop them before they set the whole camp ablaze!'
'The leaderless half-orcs will find it much harder to maintain their presence without shelter and supplies. You have done well, [placeholder].'
Palanaer is in Echad Dúnann, south-west of Târ Stazg.\n\nYou should return to Palanaer and report your success.
'The half-orc tents are spread throughout Târ Stazg to the north-east.'
